long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get the latest stock market news directly on your new browser tab. This extension pulls in the latest business and finance headlines from top news providers and updates them throughout the day. 

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Stocks New Tab extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use https://stocksnewtab.com/terms-of-service/ and Policy https://stocksnewtab.com/privacy-policy/

Permissions used by this extension: 
Storage - Stores stock news data until headlines are refreshed.
